title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 22.21 - Effect of mistakes
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 22.21 - Effect of mistakes

State Regulations

No mistake made in good faith and despite the exercise of due
care in connection with the administration of a common trust fund shall be
deemed to be a violation of this Part if after the discovery of the mistake the
trust company takes promptly whatever action may be practicable in the
circumstances to remedy the mistake. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3
ยง
22.21

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
